# Description: src/infrastructure/storage/cache/prefix_cache.py

Module docstring (if present):

    Prefix Cache System.

    Hash-based content-addressable caching for LLM inference:
    - Block-level caching with reference counting
    - LRU/LFU/ARC eviction policies
    - Cache statistics and monitoring

    Inspired by vLLM's v1/core/kv_cache_utils.py architecture.

Top-level members:
- Classes: EvictionPolicy, PrefixCacheConfig, CacheBlock, PrefixCacheStats, PrefixCacheManager, BlockHasher
- Functions: compute_block_hash, create_prefix_cache, get_request_block_hasher

- This description was auto-generated by scripts/generate_docs_for_src.py
